description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME. Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted on January 19, 2023 by 2:00 PM EST. All bids submitted after 2:00 PM EST will result in the bid being declared non-responsive. Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC), Real Property Branch requires a qualified contractor. Contractor is to provide temporary lighting during construction. The Contractor must perform and complete the Work in its entirety within 14 weeks from the date of notification of acceptance of the offer. This is the second phase of a two-phase solicitation process: the first phase evaluated the qualifications of all interested suppliers; the second phase invites the qualified suppliers to provide a financial bid on the project based on the specifications and drawings.

full_summary:
### Tender Announcement: Replacement of Perimeter Lights at Beaver Creek Institution - Phase 2

**Contract Information**

* **Contract Title (English)**: Beaver Creek Institution Perimeter Lights Replacement - Phase 2
* **Contract Title (French)**: Remplacement des lumières du périmètre de l'établissement Beaver Creek - Phase 2
* **Contract ID (English)**: WS3712987383-Doc3797670736
* **Contract ID (French)**: WS3712987383-Doc3797670736

**Procurement Details**

* **Solicitation Number**: WS3712987383
* **Publication Date**: December 22, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date and Time**: January 19, 2023 14:00 EST
* **Amendment Date**: January 13, 2023
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Procurement Category**: Construction and Maintenance Services (CNST)
* **Notice Type**: Invitation to Qualify
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price

**Project Description**

Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC), Real Property Branch is seeking a qualified contractor to replace 141 perimeter lights at the Beaver Creek Institution with new LED fixtures. The contractor is also required to provide temporary lighting during construction. The project must be completed within 14 weeks from the date of notification of acceptance of the offer.

**Important Dates**

* **Expected Contract Start Date**: December 5, 2022
* **Expected Contract End Date**: April 5, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date and Time**: January 19, 2023 14:00 EST

**Contact Information**

* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contact Name**: Zobia Essa (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Email**: [zobia.essa@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:zobia.essa@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* **Phone**: None
* **Fax**: None
